display_long_description:
**Home Invasion is a standalone version of the Drop Dead: The Cabin experience. If you already own The Cabin, there’s no need to purchase Home Invasion, as it offers the same mixed reality gameplay.**

Immerse yourself in the award-winning Home Invasion Mixed Reality Experience, where you'll be plunged into a heart-racing, adrenaline-fueled scenario that will test your wits and survival instincts like never before. Prepare to defend yourself as relentless waves of zombies and terrifying monsters break through your walls, crash through windows, and invade your real-world environment.

[media]

# Unmatched Realism:

The power of mixed reality technology makes you feel like you're truly trapped in your house with hordes of Zombies breaching walls and windows.

[media]

# Unpredictable Zombie Invasion in Your Home:

Face off against zombie home invaders who will stop at nothing to terrorise and eliminate you. Choose a difficulty level and see how long you can last against an unstoppable, and escalating invasion.


[media]

# Innovative Gameplay + Weapons:

A variety of weapons can be used to defend yourself from the horde, from common household items such as plates, pans, and bottles to more advanced weapons like fully automatic firearms earn more as you progress through the waves.

[media]

# Spectacular Graphics:

Home Invasion showcases cutting-edge graphics that blur the lines between reality and the virtual world, ensuring an unforgettable and spine-chilling experience.

# Unpredictable Zombie Invasion in Your Home:

Face off against zombie home invaders who will stop at nothing to terrorise and eliminate you. Choose a difficulty level and see how long you can last against an unstoppable, and escalating invasion.
